subject: Baseball
Septic Shock
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After a 2006 case of septic shock, Dave Wallace passed on jobs because he did not feel up to them physically. Now 67 and with the Orioles, he is the oldest pitching coach in the majors.
snippet: After a 2006 case of septic shock, Dave Wallace passed on jobs because he did not feel up to them physically. Now 67 and with the Orioles, he is the oldest pitching coach in the majors.
